text: The Women's 400 metres event at the 2006 IAAF World Indoor Championships was held on March 10–12. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Olesya Forsheva '''' |Vania Stambolova '''' |Christine Amertil '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== First 2 of each heat (Q) and the next 4 fastest (q) qualified for the semifinals. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
